name.ja: ドラゴン・トライブ・フュージョン

requirement.en: You have a face-up Level 7 or higher Dragon Type monster on your field.

effect.en: Fusion Summon by shuffling 1 face-up Dragon Type Normal Monster from your field and 1 or more Dragon Type monsters from your Graveyard into the owner's Deck as material. This turn, you can only attack with Fusion Monsters.
